Israeli court postpones Netanyahu appearance in corruption trial
subhead: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu and his wife are accused of accepting $260,000 in luxury gifts for political favors. His lawyers requested a two-week delay in testimony, citing security concerns after a ceasefire with Iran. Trump on Wednesday called the trial a 'witch hunt.'

title: Inter Miami: An ambitious young franchise and haven for former Barça stars
subhead: Led by Lionel Messi and chaired by David Beckham, Inter Miami will face Paris Saint-Germain on Sunday in Atlanta in the round of 16 of the FIFA Club World Cup. The Florida-based team is the last remaining US representative in the competition.

title: Does an emotional support animal belong on a plane?
subhead: Dogs, but also turkeys and ponies... Emotional support animals are intended to ease flight anxiety. So much so that some airlines have had to modify their regulations.

title: Pontus Hultén, the Swede who created Paris's Centre Pompidou
subhead: Hultén, the director of the National Museum of Modern Art from 1973 to 1981, saw art as a means of changing the world. He spearheaded the Centre Pompidou project in Paris, elevating it to the rank of an international institution. A new exhibition at the Grand Palais celebrates the deep friendship that bound this talent scout to Niki de Saint Phalle and Jean Tinguely.

title: To fight rhino poaching, nothing works better than cutting off their horns
subhead: According to a study conducted in 11 South African reserves between 2017 and 2023, dehorning reduced poaching by 78%.

title: In China, coins and banknotes have all but disappeared
subhead: From supermarkets to cafés and public transportation, everyday payments are made using WeChat or Alipay, two apps that have become essential to daily life in the country.

title: Syringe attacks at France-wide music event: How panic spread on social media
subhead: After the evening of Fête de la Musique, nearly 145 suspected cases of 'random syringe attacks' were reported. Yet, to date, not a single case of drug injection has been confirmed.
